attributes.review: I was downloading the app it took 5000 years to download and then when it finally downloaded I had to put it on my information which was kind of sketchy Trump why do you want it all information when you're trying to shut down TikTok with the information anyway the music was kind of scary and it made me think of Michael Jackson I took a nap and I woke up I thought I saw Michael Jackson in my room and then I just said no it's not him and then I went to the bathroom I can't pick up my room and I saw him singing hey hey in my room like what was he doing in there seriously Trump you really sent Michael Jackson to my room and it wasn't that nice one it was a scary version really Trump and then I kicked him out and all of a sudden I see dead bugs everywhere in my room and I hate bugs so F for you trump and when my mom vacuumed all the bugs up in the vacuum cleaner my dad came home singing the song that was on the app and he said he found Michael Jackson outside and brought him in and was like this is my new friend and I started running in my room I went back to sleep and I woke up and Michael Jackson and my dad were both singing again in my room and they're a bunch of bugs everywhere my mom was singing my brothers were singing my sisters were singing and I was trapped in my house and I have a son and I deleted the app and my whole phone blew up in my house so I am writing this on my new phone thank you Trump thank you so much this is all I've been seeing when I read these reviews these reviews are fake this app is not bad this app is very good it's about Trump and I think Trump should win trump 2020 baby
